page.title: 07GOLDERS GREEN STATION
page.content: At{Golders Green Bus Station}550 buses come in every day. There are{15 diff- {erent routes:}2 single-deckers, 6 metros, 6 double-deckers and one mini- bus. One of these routes, (No.26), has a special{computerised ticket machine which tells the time and date you got on the bus. The H2 bus drops you off wherever you want. The{National Buses}start at Victoria, call in at Golders Green and go on to many places in the north of England. {LONDON UNDERGROUND STATION}(which is above ground) is part of the bus station. 300 trains come into this station every day.{Morden in Surrey}is the{furthest place}a train from this station goes to. On one train there are 7 carriages which are each 13m long. 800 people can fit into one train, but sometimes there are only 50.
